main event: Witnesses observed four diamond-shaped lights in the sky over Wilmington, Delaware on 4 November 1956.
interesting points: The objects appeared the size of peas at arm's length,The objects showed like lights reflected from an aircraft wing,The observation lasted for five seconds, The lights were in a formation forming a triangular shape with the point heading northeast, The sighting occurred under clear conditions with bright stars visible.
witness description: a mother and her two sons, ages 11 and 13
